summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of Balanced Elementals collection page completed. All UI/UX features working correctly with excellent design implementation.

api_issues.issue: Returns 520 status code instead of proper JSON response
api_issues.impact: SYNC TO SHOPIFY functionality not working
api_issues.note: Expected issue due to Shopify credentials not configured in production environment

integration_issues.issue: Buttons correctly disabled due to Shopify disconnection

passed_tests: Navigation: MATRX MERCH link works with correct highlighting
Main page: BALANCED ELEMENTALS title and BY MUSIQ MATRIX branding display
Element cards: All 4 elements (Earth, Water, Fire, Air) with correct colors
Element descriptions: Proper text content for each element
VIEW COLLECTION buttons: Navigate to correct element subpages
Element subpages: Load correctly at /matrx-merch/[element] URLs
Subpage content: Element titles, descriptions, and product details
Product cards: 4 products per element with correct information
ADD TO CART buttons: Present and show appropriate toast messages
Back navigation: Returns from element pages to main collection
Shopify status indicator: Displays correct disconnection status
Responsive design: Proper layout and styling across elements
Data attributes: All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
action_item_for_main_agent: Configure Shopify API credentials in production environment (.env variables: SHOPIFY_API_KEY, SHOPIFY_API_SECRET, SHOPIFY_STORE_URL) to enable SYNC TO SHOPIFY functionality. API route exists but returns 520 error due to missing credentials.
